channel.title: Usermanu on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Usermanu on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme

item.title: Running Guide
item.description: Download and unzip the compressed package. Download MongoDB, MongoDB Tools and MongoDB Campass, install MongoDB and MongoDB Tools in the same path. (e.g., C:\Program Files\MongoDB). Open MongoDB Campass, click Connect to create a new database, and create a new database named it checkmaster. Open the command prompt as administrator, enter the path of the MongoDB Tools, then run following commands: mongoimport -d checkmaster -c nodes [node.dat] mongoimport -d checkmaster -c projects [project.
